title: A Soothing Tasty Herb
author: Davo
citation: Davo. "A Soothing Tasty Herb: experience with Lavender & Cannabis (ID 98459)". Erowid.org. Jan 18, 2013. erowid.org/exp/98459
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ Switch Colors ]
report:
Lavender is a wonderful herb to smoke. It leaves me with a pleasant lavender taste and smell, it is also very easy on the lungs. I make sure to always mix lavender in with my weed and the two go great together. It completely smooths the smoke and prevents any coughing from large bowls.

Taking 3 bowls of only lavender I started to feel somewhat more relaxed and calm. I also felt some heaviness in my body. The effects were relatively quick to dissipate however, I'd say they only lasted from 5-10 minutes.
